myfunction("burp")

```{python}
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize, sent_tokenize
text = "Dr. Byrd's students can't wait to analyze PIE roots!"
word_tokenize(text)
sent_tokenize(text)
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd
freq = nltk.FreqDist(word_tokenize(text.lower()))
df = pd.DataFrame(freq.items(), columns=["word", "count"]).sort_values("count", ascending=False)
df
```

```{python}
import spacy
nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")
doc = nlp("The children ran quickly to their houses.")
for token in doc:
    print(token.text, token.lemma_, token.pos_)

```
